title: Marriage Series 1: Spiritual Leadership for Husbands
meta: 17-slide presentation teaching husbands biblical spiritual leadership based on Ephesians 5:23-33, Joshua 24:15, and 1 Peter 3:7. Covers leading by serving (not controlling), setting spiritual tone, humility, being a student of your wife, guarding heart and eyes, providing spiritual protection, decision-making with wisdom, depending on the Holy Spirit, and responding to failure. Includes 10 prayer points and practical daily/weekly actions for husbands.
scripture: Ephesians 5:23-33, Joshua 24:15, Proverbs 11:2, 1 Peter 3:7, Job 31:1, Ephesians 6:12, James 1:5, Galatians 5:22-23, 1 John 1:9
speaker: Marriage Series Resource
keyThemes: Spiritual leadership as servanthood, not tyranny
Setting the spiritual tone of your home
Leading with humility and admitting failure
Being a student of your wife (1 Peter 3:7)
Guarding heart and eyes from temptation
Depending on Holy Spirit power daily
Practical daily and weekly leadership actions

title: Marriage Series 2: Loving Your Wife Like Christ
meta: 20-slide presentation on Ephesians 5:25-33 teaching husbands to love with Christ's sacrificial, unconditional agape love. Covers giving yourself up for her, pursuing her holiness, loving her as your own body, nourishing and cherishing, knowing her needs, speaking life, unconditional love, protection, practical service, and gospel foundation. Includes 10 prayer points and a 7-day love challenge.
scripture: Ephesians 5:25-33, John 15:13, Proverbs 18:21, 1 Corinthians 13:4-8, Mark 10:45, Colossians 3:19, 1 Peter 3:7, Romans 5:8
speaker: Marriage Series Resource
keyThemes: Ephesians 5:25 - love as Christ loved the church
Give yourself up - sacrifice time, comfort, preferences
Pursue her holiness and spiritual growth
Love her as your own body (one flesh)
Speak life and blessing over her
Unconditional love not based on performance

title: Marriage Series 3: Communication & Love Languages
meta: 22-slide presentation on biblical communication (James 1:19, Proverbs 15:1) and Dr. Gary Chapman's 5 Love Languages. Teaches quick to listen/slow to speak/slow to anger, speaking with gentleness, understanding the 5 love languages (Words of Affirmation, Quality Time, Gifts, Acts of Service, Physical Touch), discovering her primary language, filling her love tank, communication during conflict, power of apology, daily connection points, and avoiding communication killers. Includes 10 prayer points.
scripture: James 1:19, Proverbs 15:1, Ephesians 4:29, 1 Thessalonians 5:11, James 5:16, Proverbs 18:21, Colossians 4:6
speaker: Marriage Series Resource
keyThemes: James 1:19 - quick to listen, slow to speak, slow to anger
The art of listening with full attention
5 Love Languages: Words, Time, Gifts, Service, Touch
Daily connection points and weekly investment

title: Marriage Series 4: Biblical Conflict Resolution
meta: 24-slide presentation on biblical conflict resolution based on James 1:19, James 4:1, Ephesians 4:26, Colossians 3:13. Teaches that conflict is normal, understanding root causes (selfishness), quick to listen/slow to speak/slow to anger, approaching with humility, attacking the problem not each other, power of forgiveness, how to apologize well, when to take breaks, fighting for unity not winning, practical resolution steps, preventative measures, role of prayer, and when to seek help. Includes 10 prayer points.
scripture: James 4:1-2, James 1:19, Proverbs 15:1, Ephesians 4:26, Proverbs 11:2, Romans 12:18, Colossians 3:13, Matthew 5:23-24, Ephesians 4:3, Proverbs 15:22
speaker: Marriage Series Resource
keyThemes: Conflict is normal - how you handle it matters
Root cause: selfishness and unfulfilled desires (James 4:1)
Quick to listen, slow to speak, slow to anger
Attack the problem, not each other
How to apologize well - no excuses or 'but'
When to take a break and cool down
Fight for unity, not for winning
Preventative measures and role of prayer

title: A Gift For You
meta: 18-slide presentation on Luke 2:10-11 teaching that Jesus is God's personal gift to each individual. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson emphasizes that the Christmas message given to lowly shepherds shows God values all people equally. Core message: unwrap and personally appropriate the gift of salvation - Jesus is not just historical but a present-day Savior. Includes 5 scripture-based prayer points covering personal value, appropriation of Jesus, unwrapping the gift, trusting God's faithfulness, and bold witness.
scripture: Luke 2:10-11, Genesis 3:15, 1 Samuel 16:7, John 1:12, Ephesians 1:17-18, Isaiah 55:11, Numbers 23:19, Galatians 4:4, Luke 2:17-18, Mark 16:15
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Jesus as God's personal gift to each individual
God chooses the excluded and marginalized
The gospel is personally for you - 'Unto YOU'
Unwrap the gift - don't leave it wrapped
Faith rooted in history, not myth
God always keeps His word - from 'He will come' to 'He has come'
God is a 'this day' God - present faithfulness

title: Angels On Call
meta: 16-slide presentation on Hebrews 1:14 and Psalm 103:20 teaching believers how to activate angelic ministry through speaking God's Word and prayer. Bishop Darlingston Johnson reveals the three roles of angels (Heaven's Worshipers, Warriors, and Protective Services) and the spiritual laws governing angelic activity. Includes practical applications on how angels respond to the voice of God's Word and believing prayer, with powerful testimonies of angelic protection and intervention.
scripture: Hebrews 1:14, Psalm 103:20, Matthew 26:53, 2 Kings 19:35, Daniel 10:12, Proverbs 18:21
speaker: Bishop Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Three roles of angels: Worshipers, Warriors, Protective Services
Angels respond to the voice of God's Word
Speaking God's Word creates legal environment for angels
Power of the tongue: death and life

title: Strategic Vision 2025-2026 Prayer Points
meta: 12-slide presentation featuring 6 strategic prayer points for Harvest Intercontinental Church's vision: Second Service launch (April 5, 2026), Emerging Leaders Initiative (ages 25-45), and 5 Nights of Fire (December 1-23, 2025). Includes powerful declarations for divine expansion, anointed worship, bold leaders answering God's call, unprecedented Shekinah glory manifestation, and a tsunami of souls with unusual miracles, signs, and wonders. Corporate prayers based on Isaiah 54:2-3, Psalm 133, 1 Timothy 4:12, Isaiah 6:8, Habakkuk 2:14, and Acts 2:17-18.
scripture: Isaiah 54:2-3, Psalm 133:1-3, 1 Timothy 4:12, Isaiah 6:8, Habakkuk 2:14, Acts 2:17-18, Ephesians 3:20-21, Jeremiah 29:11
speaker: Prayer Ministry

title: Fake Worship: When Worshipping Is Not For Real
meta: 22-slide presentation on Matthew 2:1-12 contrasting real worship (wise men) with fake worship (King Herod). Bishop Darlingston Johnson teaches that authentic worship requires genuine hunger for knowing Jesus personally, active pursuit and focus on Christ, and complete surrender of self and substance. Core insight: worship without surrendering is simply an attempt to manage God. Includes 8 scripture-based prayer points covering hunger, focus, surrender, transformation, stopping management of God, personal conviction, obedience, and honoring with treasures.
scripture: Matthew 2:1-12, Matthew 6:21, Luke 14:33, Hebrews 11:6, Romans 12:1-2, John 14:15, Malachi 3:8-10, Proverbs 3:9
speaker: Bishop Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Wise men as model: hunger, pursuit, surrender
Herod as model of fake worship: troubled, information without transformation
Worship without surrender is managing God
Complete surrender of self and substance
Jesus as both Savior and King

title: Living A Significant Life
meta: 13-slide presentation on Luke 5:1-11 teaching believers to move from survival through success to significance. Pastor James Muyango from Rwanda outlines four key principles: acknowledge God's grace, surrender your boats (resources), what you surrender is empowered to do exploits, and beyond the boat surrender your life. Features the miraculous catch of fish as the central illustration showing how ordinary resources become supernaturally productive when surrendered to Jesus.
scripture: Luke 5:1-11, John 10:10, Matthew 22:37-39, 1 Corinthians 15:10, Matthew 6:21, Matthew 6:33
speaker: Pastor James Muyango
keyThemes: Three levels of living: Survival, Success, Significance
What you surrender is empowered to do exploits
Beyond the boat, surrender your life
Grace locates you at your lowest point
Seek first the kingdom of God

title: The Names of God and Their Meaning
meta: Comprehensive study resource featuring 150+ biblical names of God with meanings, scripture references (NIV), and prayer applications. Organized into 12 sections: Primary Names (Elohim, Yahweh, Adonai, El), 18 El Compound Names (El Shaddai, El Elyon, El Roi, El Olam, El Gibhor, El Qanna, and more), 16 Yahweh/Jehovah Compound Names (Jireh, Rapha, Nissi, Shalom, Rohi, Tsidkenu, Shammah, Sabaoth, and more), 20 New Testament Names of Jesus (Immanuel, The Word, Lamb of God, Good Shepherd, and more), 7 I AM Statements, and 110+ Divine Titles organized A-Z. Includes 10 prayer points for personal application. Sourced from multiple Bible study resources including chronic-joy.org, ibelieve.com, davidjeremiah.org, blueletterbible.org, lwf.org, and more.
scripture: Genesis 1:1, Exodus 3:14, Genesis 22:14, Exodus 15:26, Judges 6:24, Psalm 23:1, Jeremiah 23:6, Ezekiel 48:35, John 1:1, Matthew 1:23, Revelation 22:13, Isaiah 9:6, Galatians 4:6
speaker: Study Resource
keyThemes: Primary names of God: Elohim, Yahweh, Adonai, El
El compound names: El Shaddai, El Elyon, El Roi, El Olam
Yahweh compound names: Jireh, Rapha, Nissi, Shalom, Rohi, Tsidkenu, Shammah, Sabaoth
Names of Jesus: Immanuel, The Word, Lamb of God, Good Shepherd, Bread of Life, Light of the World
Divine titles: Alpha and Omega, King of Kings, Wonderful Counselor, Abba Father
God's character revealed through His names

title: Finding Yourself Among The Grateful
meta: 14-slide presentation on Luke 17:11-19 teaching believers to be among the grateful, not the ungrateful majority. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson examines three biblical examples (the one grateful leper, Naaman, and Hannah) to show how gratitude is expressed through noticing blessings, knowing the Blesser, and making blessings an offering. Learn why ingratitude is destructive to relationships, health, and spiritual growth, and how entitlement blocks true thanksgiving.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Don't be among the ungrateful nine/majority
Ingratitude is the opposite of faith
Christians should be the most grateful people
Know the Blesser - return to Jesus
Gratitude is not complete until blessing becomes offering

title: Thanksgiving to the Lord
meta: 14-slide presentation featuring 10 NIV Bible verses on gratitude for leading prayer and worship. Includes 5 African thanksgiving songs (Sinach, Tim Godfrey, Mercy Chinwo, Nathaniel Bassey, Frank Edwards) and 3 American worship songs (Bethel Music, Matt Redman, Don Moen) with YouTube links. Covers entering God's presence, thanksgiving in all circumstances, lifestyle of gratitude, overcoming anxiety, salvation, worship with music, and God's eternal kingdom. Perfect for Thanksgiving services, prayer meetings, and corporate worship.
scripture: Psalm 100:4, 1 Thessalonians 5:18, Psalm 107:1, Colossians 3:17, Ephesians 5:20, Philippians 4:6, 2 Corinthians 9:15, Psalm 95:2, Hebrews 12:28, Psalm 136:1
speaker: Prayer Ministry
keyThemes: Thanksgiving as gateway to God's presence

title: Living the Higher Life
meta: 14-slide presentation on Colossians 3:1-10 teaching believers to embrace their spiritual identity in Christ and live from their heavenly position. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson uses powerful illustrations (airplane, eagle/chicken) to demonstrate living above life's circumstances through faith in Christ, love for one another, and everlasting hope.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Living from spiritual position in Christ
Three marks of maturity: Faith, Love, Hope
Set your mind on things above

title: How to Live a Life of True Worship
meta: 22-slide presentation on Romans 12:1-18 teaching true worship as total consecration of body, soul, and spirit to God. Rev. Casimir Bilong provides six key principles for living a life of worship: beware of the world, submit to transformation, understand your role in the body, use your gifts faithfully, build genuine relationships, and reflect Christ to the world. Includes 9 prayer points and practical applications for daily Christian living.
speaker: Rev. Casimir Bilong
keyThemes: Six principles for life of worship
Understanding your role in the body

title: How to Meditate God's Way
meta: 20-slide presentation on Joshua 1:8 teaching biblical meditation as God's chosen method for transformation and success. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson provides practical instruction using the MUSE framework (4 M's) and MEDITATE acronym for moving God's Word from head to heart through sustained meditation. Includes powerful illustrations on brain rewiring, the tree by rivers of water, and 12 prayer points.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: MUSE framework: Muse, Mutter, Mouth, Memorize
Day and night meditation as lifestyle

title: November 2025 - 2 Days of Prayer and Fasting
meta: 31-slide prayer guide for November 5-6, 2025. Day 1: Praying for HIM-U and the Nations (leadership, church planting, apostolic mandate, resources). Day 2: Praying for Harvest Olney (justification, Holy Spirit power, Invest Beyond, financial breakthrough).
speaker: Prayer Ministry

title: Biblical Meditation - The Key to Success
meta: 17-slide presentation on Joshua 1:8 teaching meditation as the most critical spiritual discipline for fulfilling God's purpose. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson provides practical instruction on moving God's Word from head to heart through sustained meditation. Includes memorable illustrations and 12 prayer points.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Meditation as most important spiritual discipline
Word moving from head to heart
Mind as thermostat - can be reset
Practical steps: Read, review, rehearse, repeat
Meditation fuels all other spiritual practices

title: You MUST Be Born Again! (Kuku-jumuku)
meta: 15-slide presentation on the absolute necessity of being born again. Pastor Zangai Peabody delivers an uncompromising message on spiritual rebirth through God's incorruptible Word. Includes 12 prayer points.
speaker: Pastor Zangai Peabody
keyThemes: Natural man cannot understand spiritual things
Led by the Spirit as sons of God

title: Making is Greater Than Blessing - An Exhortation on Biblical Giving
meta: 25-slide exhortation addressing God's purpose in giving: transforming us into Christ's image rather than merely blessing us financially. Challenges two extremes (giving to get blessed vs. not giving due to self-sufficiency) and calls believers to sacrificial generosity that reflects Christ's character.
speaker: Special Exhortation
keyThemes: God's goal: making us like Christ
Giving to become, not to get

title: The Secret of Victory Over Sin, Satan And Self
meta: 44-slide presentation on Romans 6:1-14 revealing the secret to victory - letting Christ's accomplished work manifest in our lives through our union with Him. Part 4 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson. Includes 10 prayer points and practical applications.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 4)
keyThemes: Dead to sin, alive to God
Four steps: KNOW, RECKON, LET NOT, PRESENT
Victory over sin, Satan, and self

title: A Steadfast Hope
meta: 40-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-5 and Hebrews 6:13-20 exploring the third treasure of salvation - steadfast hope anchored in Christ. Part 3 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 3)
keyThemes: Steadfast hope as essential to life

title: HIMU Men's Conference 2025 - Prayer Points
meta: 11-slide presentation with 10 prayer points for the HIMU Men's Conference 2025. Standing Firm, Leading Boldly theme covering conference preparation, speakers, spiritual growth, finances, health, brotherhood, and revival.
scripture: 1 Corinthians 16:13, Psalm 107:1, James 4:8, Zechariah 4:6, Deuteronomy 8:18, 3 John 1:2, Proverbs 27:17, Psalm 85:6, Nehemiah 8:10
speaker: Conference Prayer Team

title: Do You Love Me More Than These?: A Call To Radical Discipleship
meta: 36-slide presentation on John 21:15-22 exploring radical discipleship, love for Christ, restoration after failure, and God's call to willing disciples. Includes 7 prayer points and practical applications for daily Christian living.
scripture: John 21:15-22, Psalm 110:3, Matthew 22:14, Luke 9:23-24, John 14:15, 1 Peter 5:2-4
speaker: Pastor Maima Moore

title: October 2025 - 3 Days of Prayer and Fasting
meta: HIMU and Nations - Unshakable Hope

title: Three Treasures of Justification
meta: 40-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-5 exploring the three treasures that come with justification: Peace with God, Access to Grace, and Hope that does not disappoint. Part 2 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Darlingston Johnson.
speaker: Bishop Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 2)

title: Gospel of Grace Summary - Peace Child
meta: 22-slide summary presentation focusing on the Six Pillars of Grace, practical applications, and prayer points. Concise version perfect for prayer meetings and small groups.
speaker: Summary Version

title: Additional Weekly Prayer Points
meta: 15-slide presentation focused on intercessory prayer for America, Harvest Intercontinental Ministries, and newly planted churches in Canada and Ethiopia.
speaker: Prayer Ministry

title: The Gospel of Grace - Peace with God
meta: 50-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-2 featuring the Peace Child story, our legal standing before God, and transformation through grace. Perfect for teaching or preaching this powerful message.
speaker: Based on sermon transcript
